sentences.sContent: Earthquakes typically occur along the jigsaw-puzzle piecesof Earth's crust, called plates, which move relative to one another, mostof the time at an imperceptibly slow pace.
sentences.sContent_eng: Earthquakes typically occur along the jigsaw-puzzle piecesof Earth's crust, called plates, which move relative to one another, mostof the time at an imperceptibly slow pace.
sentences.sCn: 地震一般发生在犬牙交错的一块块地壳（板块）间。 这些板块相向运动，大部分时间我们察觉不到它们的移动。

words.tran: 细微；目所不见；无法感知
